description: In a rare celestial alignment, Saturn’s largest moon Titan will cast its shadow across the planet in a series of stunning transits during the summer and early fall of 2025. These events, visible through telescopes, appear as dark “holes” drifting across Saturn’s face as Titan eclipses the planet. The phenomenon occurs only near Saturn’s equinox every 15 years, making this year’s sightings a must-see before they disappear until 2040. With seven transits still to come between July and October 2025, skywatchers should prepare for a spectacular planetary display.
title: Rare Titan Shadow Transits Will Sweep Across Saturn in Summer 2025

description: Astronomers have detected early signs of planet formation in 27 young protoplanetary disks within the Ophiuchus star-forming region, just 460 light-years away. High-resolution imaging revealed spiral and ring patterns forming earlier than expected, suggesting stars and planets may grow together from infancy. The findings bridge a knowledge gap between previous ALMA studies of younger and older stellar systems.
title: Astronomers Discover Baby Planets Taking Their First Steps in Nearby Stellar Nursery

description: Written and directed by Drew Hancock, Companion is a Sci-fi C.rime thriller movie that follows a couple, along with their friends, who go on a weekend getaway. However, soon the leisure turns into a deadly chaos, where one of the guests turns out to be a robot. Watch to dark side of technology.
title: Companion Now Available for Streaming JioHotstar: What You Need to Know About This Si-Fi Thriller Movie

description: After a long span of time, witness the ultimate blend of betrayal, destruction, and loyalty, where love will get only darker. Evol, a romantic thriller, revolves around couples who confess their affairs and accept an open relationship. The movie is currently streaming on AhaTamil.
title: Evol Now Streaming on Aha Tamil: Everything You Need to Know About This Tamil Romantic Thriller

description: Mandala Murders, a Vaani Kapoor Starrer, is an upcoming crime thriller series, where she portrays a detective, along with Vaibhav Raj Gupta. The two investigate a case of ritualistic killings where they uncover dark truths, conspiracy, and a century-old faith of the town of Charandaspur.
title: Mandala Murders OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Marry My Husband is a drama series that has finally landed on the digital screens. Directed by Won-Kook Park, this series is high on entertainment and drama. The series follows a lady killed by her husband, wakes up 10 years in the past, only to seek revenge. Watch now, only on Prime Video.
title: Marry My Husband Now Streaming on Amazon Prime Video: Everything You Need to Know

description: Astronomers have uncovered the most distant mini-halo ever detected, located around the galaxy cluster SpARCS1049, a staggering 10 billion light-years from Earth. Using the LOFAR radio telescope network, which spans eight European countries, researchers detected a faint, diffuse glow—evidence of a giant cloud of high-energy particles and magnetic fields stretching over a million light-years. This mini-halo signals that galaxy clusters were already bathed in energetic particles early in the universe's history. The discovery opens a new window into how black holes and particle collisions may have shaped massive cosmic structures much earlier than previously known, and sets the stage for even deeper exploration using next-generation instruments like the Square Kilometre Array.
title: Most Distant Mini-Halo Discovered in Galaxy Cluster 10 Billion Light-Years Away

description: NASA’s Chandra X-ray Observatory has released a stunning composite image of the Andromeda galaxy, combining data across the electromagnetic spectrum. This multi-wavelength view highlights X-ray flares near the central black hole and pays tribute to Dr. Vera Rubin’s pioneering dark matter research. The image, also presented through a musical sonification, deepens our understanding of spiral galaxy structures.
title: NASA’s Chandra Reveals Stunning Multi-Wavelength Image of Andromeda Galaxy

description: NASA’s Perseverance rover has analysed an unusual rock called “Kenmore”, uncovering clay and manganese-rich minerals. Alongside, it broke its own Martian driving record, covering 1,348 feet using autonomous navigation. The findings may guide future missions in sampling and habitat planning, deepening our understanding of Mars’ geological complexity.
title: NASA’s Perseverance Rover Investigates Strange Martian Rock

description: A new study raises the possibility that two meteorites may have originated from Mercury, a first if proven true. Ksar Ghilane 022 and NWA 15915 share notable traits with Mercury’s surface minerals, yet also present differences that complicate a clear link.
title: New Study Suggests Two Meteorites May Be from Mercury, Offering Rare Scientific Insight

description: Rocket Lab launched four satellites for Hawkeye 360 from New Zealand on June 27 aboard its Electron rocket. The mission deployed radio-frequency monitoring satellites and a tech demo into polar orbit, supporting strategic intelligence operations. It marks the company’s 67th launch and ninth of 2025, with several more missions slated before year-end.
title: Rocket Lab Launches ‘Get the Hawk Outta Here’ Mission with Four Satellites from New Zealand

description: Surf Girls: International is an upcoming docu-series that features highly competitive female surfers from across the globe competing for a world surf tour. The series is full of life and exemplifies personal journeys. Streaming starts from July 17th, 2025, on Prime Video.
title: Surf Girls: International OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 is expected to go official next week. Just days ahead of that, a new leak has revealed the design of the foldable. The leak shows that Samsung has removed the camera ring design from the Galaxy Z Fold 7. The new phone is expected to ship with the Snapdragon 8 Elite for Galaxy chipset.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 Could Drop a Key Design Feature of the Galaxy Z Fold 6

description: A voice actor who essayed the role of the protagonist in Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag has hinted that a remake of the game is in development. Ubisoft has not shared details but has confirmed that several remakes of older Assassin's Creed games are in the works.
title: Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag Voice Actor Hints a Remake Is in Development

description: Alibaba’s Qwen team released a new image generation artificial intelligence (AI) model last week. Dubbed Qwen VLo, it is a successor to the Qwen 2.5 vision language model and comes with several upgrades compared to the older models. The latest AI image model supports both text-to-image and image-to-image generation. It also supports text input in multiple languages, including English and Chinese.
title: Qwen VLo Image Generation AI Model Released, Offers Image Generation and Editing for Free

description: Vivo X200 FE has been confirmed to be available in Amber Yellow and Luxe Black colour options in India. It was launched in Taiwan and Malaysia in Black, Blue, Pink, and Yellow colourways. The phone is equipped with a MediaTek Dimensity 9300+ chipset and will pack a 6,500mAh battery and 90W fast charging support.
title: Vivo X200 FE Colour Options Teased Ahead of India Launch; Specifications Confirmed

description: Vi announced that it is rolling out 5G services in 23 more Indian cities, including Ahmedabad, Agra, Aurangabad, Kozhikode, Cochin, Dehradun, Indore, Jaipur, Kolkata, Lucknow, Madurai, Malappuram, Meerut, Nagpur, Nashik, Pune, Rajkot, Sonepat, Surat, Siliguri, Trivandrum, Vadodara and Vizag. The rollout will happen in phases. Vi 5G network was already available in Delhi, Mumbai, Patna, Chandigarh and Bengaluru.
title: Vodafone Idea (Vi) Announces Rollout of 5G Services in 23 More Indian CIties

description: Facebook is reportedly asking users to share private media from their camera roll to Meta’s cloud servers. As per the report, a pop-up message requesting access appears when users upload a photo or a video to Stories. The social media giant reportedly says that by giving access, Meta AI will suggest collages and artificial intelligence (AI)-powered edits that they can post in Stories.
title: Facebook Reportedly Asking Users Access to Private Media in Camera Roll for Meta AI Features

description: Nvidia insiders sold over $1 billion worth of company stock in the past year, with a notable uptick in recent trading activity as executives capitalize on surging investor interest in artificial intelligence, the Financial Times reported on Sunday.
title: Jensen Huang, Other Nvidia Insiders Sold Over $1 Billion in Stock Amid Market Surge: Report

description: Samsung Galaxy A55 5G was unveiled with Android 14-based One UI 6.1 last year and is promised four OS upgrades and five years of security updates. It recently received the stable One UI 7 update based on Android 15. Now, a Geekbench listing of the phone shows it running Android 16, suggesting that Samsung may soon release One UI 8 beta update for the Galaxy A55 5G.
title: Samsung Galaxy A55 5G Spotted on Geekbench With Android 16; May Receive One UI 8 Beta Update Soon

description: Samsung issued an advisory on Saturday to compatible Galaxy device users, encouraging them to activate the latest anti-theft features. The South Korean tech giant highlighted the rising cases of mobile theft and emphasised that the existing security features and the new ones added via the One UI 7 update will enable users to better protect their data and their device.
title: Samsung Issues Advisory to Galaxy Users, Asks Them to Activate Latest Anti-Theft Features

description: Sony Bravia Theatre System 6 and Bravia Theatre Bar 6 were launched in India on Monday. The latest audio products from the Japanese brand come with support for Dolby Atmos and DTS:X technologies. The Sony Bravia Theatre System 6 has a 5.1 channel configuration and a 1000W output. Meanwhile, the Theatre Bar 6 comes in a 3.1.2 setup with up-firing speakers on the soundbar. They also carry an integrated UI which is compatible across Sony Bravia TVs.
title: Sony Bravia Theatre System 6, Theatre Bar 6 Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: Vijay Sales' Open Box Sale is live in India. The sale started on June 28 and features last-piece and display or demo products. The demo units of the iPhone 15 models, the Galaxy Z Fold 6, and the Galaxy Z Flip 6 with discounted price tags. The sale brings up to 50 percent off on TVs, tablets and laptops.
title: Vijay Sales Open Box Sale Brings Discount on iPhone 15, Galaxy Z Fold 6, Xiaomi 14 Civi, More

description: Vivo has teased the India launch of the X Fold 5, with availability confirmed via Flipkart. The Indian variant will feature a 6,000mAh battery with 80W wired and 40W wireless charging, similar to the Chinese counterpart. It will measure 9.2mm folded and 4.3mm unfolded, and it weighs 217g. The Zeiss-backed triple rear camera will include a 50-megapixel telephoto shooter, and the Vivo X Fold 5 will support AI Image Studio and a Shortcut Button.
title: Vivo X Fold 5 India Launch Teased; Key Features Revealed, Flipkart Availability Confirmed

description: WhatsApp is said to be developing a new feature for its iOS app which aims to simplify the ability to handle multiple accounts on one iPhone. Earlier this year, the Meta-owned instant messaging platform was reported to be developing multi-account support for iOS devices. Building upon this, a feature tracker claims WhatsApp for iOS will add a new section in settings that shows all of the accounts signed in on the iPhone and quickly switch between them.
title: WhatsApp for iOS Said to Be Testing Feature Which Lets You Switch Between Multiple Accounts

description: Leaked screenshots from an internal playtest of Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 confirm two new multiplayer game modes. Black Ops 7 is set for a full reveal this summer and will launch later this year.
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 Leak Reveals Two New Multiplayer Modes

description: Xiaomi 16 Ultra is rumoured to come with SmartSens camera components. It is expected to feature the SC5A0CS 1-inch camera sensor, developed by SmartSens as a replacement for the Sony LYT-900. The Xiaomi 16 Ultra is likely to be launched early next year. The handset is rumoured to be equipped with the unannounced Snapdragon 8 Elite 2 SoC.
title: Xiaomi 16 Ultra Tipped to Use SmartSens Camera Sensor Instead of Sony LYT-900

description: Baidu, the Chinese tech giant, is making its Ernie artificial intelligence (AI) model open-source on Monday. The company announced the move in February, and has already made its chatbot free to use. This is being viewed as a watershed moment in China’s AI space, as this is the first time a major AI player has decided to release its proprietary technology to the open community.
title: Baidu to Open-Source Ernie AI Model Starting Today, Could Make It China’s 2nd DeepSeek Moment

description: Bandai Namco has announced that it will host a Summer Showcase livestream this week, where it will reveal a new My Hero Academia game. The company also shared the showcase's entire lineup in its announcement.
title: Bandai Namco Announces Summer Showcase, Will Reveal New Game This Week

description: Are you planning to buy a new refrigerator under Rs. 10,000? Several brands offer excellent compact single-door options. LG, BPL, Cruise, and Amazon's Solimo provide affordable choices perfect for cooling beverages, snacks, or cosmetics. Read on to know more about the best refrigerators under Rs. 10,000 in India.
title: Best Refrigerators Under Rs. 10,000 in India (June 2025): LG, BPL, Cruise and More

description: Gmail has introduced a new page which makes it easier to manage your subscriptions. Listed as Manage Subscriptions, it appears in the left-hand toolbar of the web client and shows all of the newsletters and mailing lists you have subscribed to in the past. Alongside, it is also reported to have introduced a new option to mark emails as read directly from the notification window on the Gmail for Android app.
title: Gmail's Web Client Gets Manage Subscriptions Page; ‘Mark as Read’ Reportedly Rolling Out to Android Users

description: Apple products wouldn’t feel complete without the mirror-finish Apple logo. Since the very first iPhone, the logo has been a defining design element, but its position has subtly shifted over the years. While recent models feature it perfectly centered on the glass back, the upcoming iPhone 17 Pro is tipped to move the logo slightly lower to make room for internal hardware and design updates.
title: iPhone 17 Pro's New Camera Design May Force Apple to Move Its Iconic Logo: Report

description: The Lenovo Yoga Tab Plus has been listed on Amazon India, revealing its design and key specifications ahead of launch. Powered by the Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chipset, the tablet packs a massive 10,200mAh battery with support for 45W fast charging. It runs on Android 14 and is promised to receive updates up to Android 17. The tablet features a 12.7-inch 3K display with a smooth 144Hz refresh rate and up to 900 nits of peak brightness.
title: Lenovo Yoga Tab Plus With Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 SoC, 10,200mAh Battery Listed on Amazon India

description: Realme 15 series, including the Realme 15 5G and 15 Pro 5G, will launch in India soon. The exact date is expected shortly, but a previous leak hinted at a July debut. The Realme 15 Pro is teased as the brand’s most advanced “AI party phone,” featuring flagship-grade features and AI-powered camera features that adapt to dynamic lighting at events.
title: Realme 15 5G, Realme 15 Pro 5G Confirmed to Launch in India Soon

description: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7 are expected to be announced next week. Ahead of the launch, a Chinese tipster has revealed the key specifications of the foldables. The Galaxy Z Fold 7 could get a 6.5-inch cover display and an 8-inch internal screen. Meanwhile, the Galaxy Z Flip 7 is said to feature a 4.1-inch cover display and a 6.9-inch internal display.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7, Galaxy Z Flip 7 Leak Suggests Key Specifications

description: AI+ Pulse and Nova 5G smartphones will launch in India on July 8 at 12:30pm IST. They will go on sale through Flipkart, Flipkart Minutes and Shopsy. The smartphones will have a starting price tag of Rs. 5,000. The AI+ phones are teased to pack a 50-megapixel main rear camera and a 5,000mAh battery.
title: AI+ Nova 5G, Pulse Smartphones to Launch in India on July 8; Price Range, Specifications Teased

description: iQOO 13 will be sold in India in a new green colourway starting July 4, an Amazon microsite confirmed. The specifications of the upcoming option will be the same as the existing model. It will offer a Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC, a Q2 gaming chip, an LTPO AMOLED display with up to 144Hz refresh rate, and a 6,000mAh battery with 120W fast charging and a 50-megapixel Sony IMX921 main primary sensor. The iQOO 13 will support Google's Circle to Search and AI features like AI Erase as well.
title: iQOO 13 to Be Available in a New Green Colour Option in India on July 4

description: Apple is said to be developing several head-mounted wearable products. According to a market analyst, as many as seven XR headsets and smart glasses are in the works across two product groups. The first will be a M5-powered Apple Vision Pro and it may be introduced as soon as Q3 2025. Meanwhile, the Cupertino-based tech giant is also developing a smart glass competitor to the Ray-Ban Meta Glasses.
title: Apple Vision Pro With M5 Chip to Launch in 2025, Smart Glasses Coming in 2027: Report

description: Nothing Headphone 1 are scheduled to be launched on July 1 alongside the Nothing Phone 3. Ahead of the anticipated launch, specifications of the first over-ear headphones from the UK-based OEM have been leaked. The Nothing Headphone 1 are said to come with support for active noise cancellation (ANC) and spatial audio. They may be equipped with 40mm drivers with LDAC codec support. Backing the headphones could be a 1,040mAh battery.
title: Nothing Headphone 1 Specifications Leak Ahead of Launch; May Offer Up to 54 Hours of Battery Life

description: Gaming smartphones are in a niche category of devices which are built for delivering the maximum fun, helped by dedicated performance modes, great haptics, efficient thermals, and snazzy designs. To help you make an informed buying decision, we have curated a list of the best gaming phones under Rs. 30,000 in India.
title: Best Gaming Phones Under Rs 30,000: Infinix GT 30 Pro 5G, iQOO Neo 10R, Poco X7 Pro, More
